function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Diffusion of pandemics ontologies through various websites may lead to the spread of incorrect or incomplete information.","Impact":"Increased risk of incorrect knowledge propagation and potential misinformation about infectious diseases.","Mitigation":"Implement a validation process to ensure the accuracy and completeness of the information before dissemination.","Technologies":"Ontology Pitfall Scanner (OOPS), Fact++","People":"Health domain actors, ontology developers","Owner":"Health organizations, ontology developers"},{"Description":"Limited evaluation of developed ontologies using only Description Logic (DL) queries may result in incomplete validation of the ontologies.","Impact":"Risk of inadequate validation and potential inaccuracies in the represented knowledge.","Mitigation":"Conduct extensive evaluations using a combination of validation methods, including semantic reasoning and competency questions.","Technologies":"OOPS, AllegroGraph","People":"Ontology developers, health domain actors","Owner":"Ontology developers, health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of a comprehensive ontology that models multiple similar diseases may hinder the effective sharing of knowledge and development of vaccines and drugs for emerging pandemics.","Impact":"Reduced ability to share knowledge, potential misunderstanding of disease details, and delay in the development of vaccines and drugs for emerging pandemics.","Mitigation":"Create a comprehensive ontology that models multiple similar diseases, focusing on shared symptoms and biological aspects.","Technologies":"Ontology development tools, semantic reasoning platforms","People":"Health domain actors, biomedical researchers","Owner":"Health organizations, biomedical research institutions"}]}
